articles.description:
Since our initial post @ether_fi has advanced to become the #1 in re-staking 
A lot of its success stems from the fact that if offers users an easy way to bypass Eigenlayer deposit caps and farm EL points + EtherFi points at same time.
There are a couple of opportunities 👇


DeFi Airdrops 🦇🔊: With Celstia at $11billion FDV the obvious question is - is there a better modular play without token?
One where the Data Availability Layer (DA) is secured by Ethereum validators?
And which enables a ton more use cases outside of DA?
But @eigenlayer is full you say?🧵
